other_title: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！ (Japanese)
plot: Misha is a little girl who lost her mother at an early age, and now lives with her father. Her father employs a maid named Tsubame, who was a former Self-Defense Force official, and is also a lolicon. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Uzauza Waossu!" (ウザウザ☆わおーっす！) by Haruka Shiraishi & Manami Numakura
ending_theme: "Tokimeki Climax" (ときめき☆くらいまっくす) by Haruka Shiraishi & Manami Numakura
